reviewText: I'm an Angela Bettis fan and I have most of her movies . This movie was filmed with a hand held camera in one continuous take from start to finish . It's a " must see " for movie buffs and people interested in cinema . The movie is shot in one continuous circle as a loop . It is difficult for the actors because there is no room for error . NO do overs  . The camera man must have been exhausted by the end of the movie .
